column2:
billboard_longer%>%
  group_by(track)%>%
  summarize(highest_rank = min(Rank), week= Week)%>%
  arrange(highest_rank)

Warning: Returning more (or less) than 1 row per `summarise()` group was deprecated in dplyr 1.1.0.
Please use `reframe()` instead.
When switching from `summarise()` to `reframe()`, remember that `reframe()` always returns an ungrouped data frame and adjust accordingly.
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'track'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
